javadoc: A listener to get notified of graph changes.

methods.javadoc:
Called when the given vertices have been added from the graph
@param vertices the added vertices
methods.name: verticesAdded
methods.comment: Called when the given vertices have been added from the graph

methods.javadoc:
Called when the given vertices have been removed from the graph
@param vertices the removed vertices
methods.name: verticesRemoved
methods.comment: Called when the given vertices have been removed from the graph

methods.javadoc:
Called when the given edges have been added from the graph
@param vertices the added edges
methods.name: edgesAdded
methods.comment: Called when the given edges have been added from the graph

methods.javadoc:
Called when the given edges have been removed from the graph
@param vertices the removed edges
methods.name: edgesRemoved
methods.comment: Called when the given edges have been removed from the graph

name: VisualGraphChangeListener
comment: A listener to get notified of graph changes.
